processor.name: GroupDiscount
processor.description: Based on if this is first or second pass, writes the Group Discount to the appropriate usage table. This technique allows us to use the same stage for first and second pass processing.

configdata.Program:
CREATE PROCEDURE groupdisc @_Amount DECIMAL OUTPUT @_ProductViewID INTEGER OUTPUT @_AccountID INTEGER OUTPUT @_PayingAccount INTEGER OUTPUT @GroupDiscountPass INTEGER @GroupDiscountPercent DECIMAL @DiscountPercent DECIMAL OUTPUT @GroupDiscountAmount DECIMAL OUTPUT -- $ICE:INOUT$ @GroupDiscountPayingAccount INTEGER AS IF @GroupDiscountPass = 1 BEGIN
-- overrides the product view to store group subscription amounts SET @_ProductViewID = CAST(CAST('metratech.com/groupdiscount_temp' AS ENUM) AS INTEGER)
-- stores the amount in the product view instead of in t_acc_usage SET @GroupDiscountAmount = @_Amount SET @_Amount = 0.0
-- uses the 'demo' account for the sake of t_acc_usage SET @_AccountID = 123 SET @_PayingAccount = 123 END
IF @GroupDiscountPass = 2 BEGIN SET @DiscountPercent = @GroupDiscountPercent SET @_Amount = @GroupDiscountAmount
-- sets the payer retrieved by accountres SET @_PayingAccount = @GroupDiscountPayingAccount END
